unnormalised: Reliance Retail's festive season sale is off to a flyer! Sources say that during the 1st week, they saw a jump of 35% in foot traffic compared to last year. The discount offers, like "Buy 2 Get 1 Free" on selected apparel brands, seems to be a hit with shoppers.
normalised: Reliance Retail's festive season sale is off to a flyer! Sources say that during the first week, they saw a jump of thirty five percent in foot traffic compared to last year. The discount offers, like "Buy two Get one Free" on selected apparel brands, seems to be a hit with shoppers.

unnormalised: Analysts are predicting a bumper quarter for the retail giant. Online sales via JioMart also saw a surge, with reports suggesting a 60% increase in orders placed between Oct 20th and Oct 27th, thanks to deals like ₹500 off on electronics for new users.
normalised: Analysts are predicting a bumper quarter for the retail giant. Online sales via JioMart also saw a surge, with reports suggesting a sixty percent increase in orders placed between October twentieth and October twenty seventh, thanks to deals like rupee five hundred off on electronics for new users.

unnormalised: Local kirana stores are also getting in on the action. Many are offering discounts through tie-ups with Paytm and PhonePe, with some offering cashbacks of upto ₹200 on purchases over ₹2000. This strategy aims to compete with the larger organized retail chains.
normalised: Local kirana stores are also getting in on the action. Many are offering discounts through tie-ups with P-A-Y-T-M and PhonePe, with some offering cashbacks of upto rupee two hundred on purchases over rupee two thousand. This strategy aims to compete with the larger organized retail chains.

unnormalised: Experts suggest that the overall retail sector could see a growth of 15-20% this festive season, driven by pent-up demand and attractive offers. Keep an eye out for even more deals as Diwali approaches on 12/11/2024!
normalised: Experts suggest that the overall retail sector could see a growth of fifteen to twenty percent this festive season, driven by pent-up demand and attractive offers. Keep an eye out for even more deals as Diwali approaches on twelfth November two thousand and twenty four!
